activities: M2 Payment Solutions LLC, a fully owned subsidiary for Digital Payments PLC, will use or otherwise process personal information received about consumers and other cardholders in the EU (“European Cardholder Data”)  in order to provide payment processing services for customers and program management for prepaid solutions.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data about merchants' customers or consumers
